description: This file defines a RecyclerView adapter and view holder for displaying a list of notes in an Android application. It includes diffing logic for efficient updates and binds note data to the UI components.

classes.name: NoteListAdapter
classes.description: A RecyclerView adapter for rendering a list of Note objects with click handling and diffing support.

classes.name: NoteDiff
classes.description: A DiffUtil callback implementation to determine differences between Note objects.

classes.name: NoteViewHolder
classes.description: A RecyclerView ViewHolder that binds Note data to UI elements and handles click events.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates and returns a new NoteViewHolder by inflating the item_note layout.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds a Note object to the given NoteViewHolder.

methods.name: areItemsTheSame
methods.description: Checks if two Note objects represent the same item based on their ID.

methods.name: areContentsTheSame
methods.description: Checks if two Note objects have the same content.

methods.name: bind
methods.description: Binds a Note object to the UI components within the ViewHolder.
